Name: Changing the names of designated landmarks.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the changing of the names of designated landmarks.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1.  Title 25 of the Administrative Code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new section 25-102.2 to read as follows: 
      ï¿½ 25-102.2.  Designated landmark names. The name of any entity designated as a landmark, pursuant to the provisions of section 25-303 of the administrative code, shall not be changed by local law.  

LS # 4659
12/14/01
1
